messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Toxins Mixing Lab.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Testing Lab.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on energy emissions we detected, we believe that one of the station's animals/bots has developed lizard level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.
